description.value:
You are specially trained to use your weapon skills in new ways.

Prerequisites
Fighter level 5th, weapon training class feature.

Benefits
Select one advanced weapon training option, applying it to one fighter weapon group you have already selected with the weapon training class feature.

Special
This feat can be taken more than once, but at most once per 5 fighter levels.Special: Fighters that have the weapon master archetype can select this feat beginning at 4th level. The benefits of a weapon master's advanced weapon training options apply only to his selected weapon rather than all weapons in the same fighter weapon group, and he can't select the weapon specialist advanced weapon training option. A weapon master can select this feat as a bonus feat; if he does so, it doesn't count for the purpose of the requirement that it can be taken at most once per 5 fighter levels.
